Advantage_-_compose_email_body.inputs:
Email Template
Dear @{outputs('Get_Account')?['body/sxp_firstname']} @{outputs('Get_Account')?['body/sxp_lastname']},

We are delighted to welcome you as a new Service Experts Advantage Program customer! You are among thousands of customers who are enjoying all the comforts of brand new equipment for one low monthly price—and never a penny more.*
As an Advantage Program customer, you will enjoy all of these benefits:

HIGH-EFFICIENCY
equipment
 

NO
money down
 

Installation
INCLUDED

Seasonal Maintenance
INCLUDED
 

Future Repairs*
INCLUDED
 

24/7 Emergency Service
INCLUDED
You will receive an invoice on a monthly basis that reflects your monthly payment amount. The first month of the new equipment’s service will likely represent a partial billing cycle depending on the actual installation date of the equipment. If this is the case, you will be invoiced for the partial month plus the first full month on a single invoice. As a result, the total of your first invoice could amount to a partial payment plus up to one full billing cycle amount.

All future invoices will reflect charges according to your normal billing cycle disclosed within your agreement. Based on the preference you selected, you will receive your first invoice by either mail or email.

In an effort to make paying your invoice more convenient, we offer both bank draft and credit card automatic payment options. For questions about your invoice, to set up automatic payments or to change your invoice delivery method call the Advantage Team Monday through Friday from 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM CST at 855-816-8616.

After you have received your first invoice visit www.serviceexperts.com/ebilling to access the following features:

  • Make a one-time payment online
  • View your bill and payment history
  • Request changes to your mailing address or phone numbers

For service or maintenance call 866-EXPERTS anytime, day or night; you will always reach one of our live customer service agents.

We look forward to providing you with excellent service and support in the years to come.

Sincerely,
@{outputs('Get_Service_Center')?['body/sxp_centername']} Team


*See your signed Advantage Agreement for full details and exclusions.
